mapper.select: SELECT course.course_id, course_name, course_time, course_credit, teacher_name FROM course, student_course, student, teacher WHERE student.stu_id = #{stu_id} AND student.stu_id = student_course.stu_id AND course.course_id = student_course.course_id AND teacher.teacher_id = course.teacher_id
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_time, course_credit FROM course, teacher WHERE teacher.teacher_id = #{teacher_id} AND teacher.teacher_id = course.teacher_id
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_time, course_credit, teacher_name FROM course, teacher WHERE teacher.teacher_id = course.teacher_id

SELECT course.course_id, course_name, course_time, course_credit, teacher_name FROM course, teacher WHERE teacher.teacher_id = course.teacher_id AND course.course_id IN (SELECT course.course_id FROM course WHERE course.course_id NOT IN (SELECT student_course.course_id FROM student_course WHERE stu_id = #{stu_id}))
